question: Should browser keep data after closing this page?
explanation: You should select <0>no</0> if the device that you are using is not private, for instance if it is a computer in Internet cafe.

yes.title: Yes
yes.description: Try to preserve my data for easier editing.

no.title: No
no.description: Delete my data after closing the page.

notice: We <0>do not</0> store any of your data on remote servers, we only store it on your device.
reminder: You can edit these settings by visiting this page again.
